component.name: BibleReader
component.script:
'** '** Example: Edit a Label size and color with BrightScript '**
function init() m.top.setFocus(true) m.myLabel = m.top.findNode("myLabel") m.myLabel.setFocus(true) m.books = m.top.findNode("books") addBooks() end function
sub addBooks() text=ReadAsciiFile("pkg:/data/books.json") books = ParseJSON(text) for each book in books addItem(book) end for end sub
sub addItem(itemtext as string) item = m.books.createChild("ContentNode") item.title = itemtext end sub
